instructions:
A sheetworker driven option for the Starfinder Roleplaying Game. See the [wiki](https://wiki.roll20.net/Starfinder_Official) for full details on the advanced features.
# Feature Overview
* PC, NPC, and Starship sheets
* Simple single page view for all sheet types
* Automated Buffing/modification of PC/NPC rolls
* Starship crew members can reference other sheets for values
* Automatic handling for ship system status effects and patching on rolls

Stop by the [forum thread](https://app.roll20.net/forum/category/277980) for questions, suggestions, or critiques.

# Acknowledgements
Thank you to the awesome Starfinder community on Roll20 for their feedback, encouragement, and testing.
